scripts.test: rm -rf coverage && concurrently -n "ssr,sb" -c "magenta,blue" "pnpm run test:ssr" "pnpm run test:storybook"
scripts.test:ci: concurrently -k -s first -n "sb,test" -c "magenta,blue" "pnpm run --filter @this/storybook storybook:build --quiet && pnpm sirv ./docs/storybook/storybook-static --host 127.0.0.1 --port 6006" "pnpm wait-port 6006 && pnpm run test"
scripts.test:storybook: pnpm --filter @this/storybook run test:coverage && pnpm nyc report --reporter=lcov -t ./docs/storybook/coverage/storybook --report-dir ./coverage/storybook
